attributes.action: Take action to ensure that dangerous smoke caused by heated oil in aircraft cabins is prevented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This health issue, which occurs in at least one in two thousand flights ( UK Government figures) must be prevented by the fitting of filters to aircraft air supply systems and regulations requiring all aircraft engine oils to be free from toxic substances like the organo phosphates currently in use.
